scripts.build: [[ -z "${PSP_DOCKER}" ]] && npm run --silent _build || npm run --silent _emsdk -- npm run --silent _build
scripts.test:build: [[ -z "${PSP_DOCKER}" ]] && npm run --silent _build_test || npm run --silent _emsdk -- npm run --silent _build_test
scripts.test:run: npm run --silent _test_perspective && npm run --silent _test_viewer && npm run --silent _test_hypergrid && npm run --silent _test_highcharts
scripts._test_perspective: PACKAGE=perspective npm run --silent _puppeteer -- npm run --silent test:run
scripts._test_viewer: PACKAGE=perspective-viewer npm run --silent _puppeteer -- npm run --silent test:run
scripts._test_hypergrid: PACKAGE=perspective-viewer-hypergrid npm run --silent _puppeteer -- npm --silent run test:run
scripts._test_highcharts: PACKAGE=perspective-viewer-highcharts npm run --silent _puppeteer -- npm --silent run test:run
